item.title: Still Learning: A New Grad's Journey from Math to Data Science
item.description:
Just documenting my learning journey so far—from math major to data science projects. Still figuring out a lot, but thought I’d share what I’ve learned and what I’m hungry to learn next.

Starting with Math: Why It Still Matters
#

I started as a math major at UCSB, spending countless hours on proofs and abstract concepts. At the time, I honestly wondered if any of this would be useful in the “real world.” Real analysis felt impossibly theoretical, and discrete math seemed like mental gymnastics.
